Dividends Declared: preferred stock dividends and other adjustments

Additional Paid-in Capital: adjustments to additional paid in capital redemption value of noncontrolling interests
adjustments to additional paid in capital sharebased compensation requisite service period recognition value
adjustments to additional paid in capital tax effect from share based compensation
adjustments to additional paid in capital warrant issued
adjustmentsto additional paidin capital warrant issued repurchased
Total Equity: stockholders equity including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest adjusted balance

Net Income: income loss from continuing operations including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest

Derivatives and Hedging: other comprehensive income derivatives qualifying as hedges net of tax period increase decrease
Foreign Currency Translation: other comprehensive income foreign currency transaction and translation adjustment net of tax period increase decrease
Other OCI: other comprehensive income defined benefit plans adjustment net of tax period increase decrease
Total Other Comprehensive Income: other comprehensive income loss net of tax
other comprehensive income loss net of tax period increase decrease
other comprehensive income loss net of tax portion attributable to parent
Unrealized Gains/Losses on Securities: other comprehensive income available for sale securities adjustment net of tax period increase decrease

Other Equity Adjustments: cumulative effect from change in accounting for embedded credit derivatives
cumulative effect from change in accounting for variable interest entities
cumulative effect of new accounting principle in period of adoption
net increase decrease in deferred compensation and related plans
tax cuts and jobs act of2017 reclassification from aoci to retained earnings tax effect

Other Stock Issuance: preferred stock issued during period value new issues
stock issued during period shares conversion of convertible securities
stock issued during period value new issues
Stock-Based Compensation: amortization of e s o p award common stock
amortization of e s o p award preferred stock

Stock Repurchases: stock redeemed or called during period value
Tax Effects from Stock Compensation: employee service share based compensation tax benefit realized from exercise of stock options
__unmapped__: minority interest in joint venture period increase decrease
net income loss attributable to noncontrolling interest
other comprehensive income loss net of tax portion attributable to noncontrolling interest
